data.text: Lusakumunu kuidi mutu wowo thaluꞌandi yidi kuidi mutu wulebakana,
Yave wela kunkeba ayi wela tanina luzingu luandi ;
Yave wela kunkindisa va mfulu andi yi kimbevo.
Bambeni ziama zilembo tubi mambu mu diela dimbimbi
yoso thangu mutu kizidi mu kuthala ;
Bambeni ziama zioso zilembo niunguta va kimosi mu diambu diama.
Ka diambu ko nkundi ama wu luzolo,
Nzebi ti ngeyo wunyangalalanga mu minu ;
Nzitusu wuba kuidi Yave, Nzambi yi Iseli,
